thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Seven Women Maternity Apparel reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Easy peasy!
Plus I got a call as I had ordered a small skirt and pant but a medium top (they called just to make sure I hadn't made an error). Buying clothes online without trying on for size can be risky, especially with maternity wear, but the whole process was great!
